name: Gale Gunner
overview: Gale Gunner is a 3d action game in which the player takes the role of Gale Accel, a space explorer that have to complete missions exploring ruins in different planets. In those missions he has to use his mecha to defeat other enemies mechas that are also in the ruins. He works for the company Xexar (search & explore alien ruins) In his journeys he got the help of his computer called Dolly & his mechanic Lippisch (that he meet in his first mission), before each mission he can select & setup his mecha, check the Xexar database (with company info, character profiles, etc), etc. After defeating an enemy in a mission the player can use select their mechas before the next mission. There is also a free battle mode when you complete the game. The game start in a planet called Inferno Blue a planet that was investigated in search of alien life. The expedition found the signs of alien life but these aliens are instructed by Misss Tress a kind of ghost, they attack the expedition and you received a call by a girl called Kersvan (16 years old) that is a scientist in the expedition Accel decided to go to the planet to rescue her and there he must battle Cross Land the organization of Ballon that guards Infernal Blue..
